Reviews.Title: “Almost canceled”
Reviews.Author: RedOne07
Reviews.Content: I made a reservation for Labor Day weekend before reading the reviews (One (only 1) negative review among all positive ones) and because of that review I almost canceled. I am now glad I did not. All rooms are full oceanfront with balcony, large enough for four adults, with a kitchenette, the place and pool are very clean, the staff very friendly and plenty of parking. And all that for a very low price. Now, who is that clinical imbecile who almost made me miss the best deal in town?

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Land O' Lakes, Florida, United States
Reviews.Title: “Awesome Labor Day Weekend”
Reviews.Author: CindiM76
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights and couldn't have asked for better customer service from the front desk staff from the moment we walked in until the day we left. This is a great little get away hotel. Our room was on the 1st floor steps away from the pool and beach and the room was clean and well maintained. We will definitely be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “A WONDERFUL PLACE TO STAY”
Reviews.Author: mrbill4806
Reviews.Content: It is a small motel with 35ish rooms. The rooms have a 4 burner stove, sink, full refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave. Additionally, it provided dishes, glasses, silverware,pots pans and cooking urtensils. THhe room had two queen sized beds, large closet,fullbath, TV, table and chairs,plus a balcony overlooking the ocean. Perfect!!!! Most important however, was the staff from the front desk to the room housekeepers. Each and everyone made sure your stay was enjoyable and they made you feel like family. With the small size, you never felt like you were one guest lost in the crowd out of hundreds. We would highly recommend this place to anybody. However, sadly, my father-in-law lives in the area and would be incensed if we did not stay with him; as he has already informed us when we stayed there this summer . Tthe only way we could pull this off would be if more family members would be staying with him at the same time With the limited room at his house we would be able to book again. Yesss!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Top!”
Reviews.Author: ElizaDarcy
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I spent one night during our Florida-Roadtrip in this Motel and we liked it a lot! The service was extremely friendly and the motel itself was very clean. The pool is small but very satisfying. The motel is situated directly at the beach and if you book a room with oceanview you'll have a wonderful sight. The rooms are huge and for this price . IN the evening we had some Pizza and went walking at the beach. We'd go there again, if we ever come back!

Reviews.Title: “Great experience of Daytona beach”
Reviews.Author: UI-Chen
Reviews.Content: We the family of four stayed here for 5 nights. We enjoyed the motel: clean, prompt service from the manager and receptionist, yet not too nosy about the guests. Our room has a kitchenette with microwave oven and fridge for us to store milk and yogurt for kids and stove for cooking their favorite ramen noodles. The room is a little small: the Microwave oven takes a part of the fable, leaving not enough room for 4 dinner plates. The location couldn't be more perfect: right on the great beach and convenient to food, grocery, and tourist activities. This is the place we will stay when we come to Daytona Beach again.

Reviews.Title: “Beachside, seaview, balcony, kitchenette, quiet”
Reviews.Author: cwbcwb
Reviews.Content: There are giant hotels around this small one, but this place is a giant on genuine friendly, helpful service. And it still has the same views as the big ones, maybe better because all the rooms face the beach, overlook the pool, and with a balcony. Full size fridge with good freezer compartment, full stove, and kitchen utensils. Quiet, never heard anyone moving in the room above us, or beside us. (Can't say that for any other place we have stayed in!). Plenty of room, clean and good value for money. Would definitely return here if in the area again.

Reviews.Title: “First time to stay, would come back again”
Reviews.Author: Pam Q
Reviews.Content: Older motel but was very clean and staff very friendly. The fastest elevator, we were on 5th floor with a great view of pool and ocean. Will come back again, very quiet atmostphere. Location was great and staff very helpful in suggesting restuarants and other activities. Only 2 blocks away from jet skiing.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Billy A
Reviews.Content: just want to say the staff was great.The couple of times we needed something they were on top of it,even going the extra mile to ensure our stay was great. My room was on the 4th floor and had a great view of pool and ocean. Property was well taken care of and room nice and comfortable for my family. I enjoy the "small family orieinted" home away from homes. i We will see Tiffany and the rest of the crew next july,cant wait.Thanks again

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT! LOVED IT! LOVED IT!”
Reviews.Author: LeisureGirls
Reviews.Content: Planned a trip to Daytona...researched in the internet and booked at the 3 Palms Hotel...Stayed one night and hated it!!! Then went to the Beachside Motel...IT WAS WONDERFUL!!! The staff was very friendly, the rooms were very clean with nice appliances and the location on the beach was perfect and last but not least the price was right! This by far was the best hotel we have ever stayed and the friendliest staff anywhere! We will always return to this hotel and will recommend it to all our friends & family!!! If you want great service, rooms, friendly staff, quiet atmosphere for a great price...then this is the place for you!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel. My second vist”
Reviews.Author: Susan B
Reviews.Content: I liked this motel so much I still came back for a second visit. Even after my second visit I can say that this motel is worth it. The price was low and the service was wonderful. It is clean which means a lot to me. The view from my room was awesome. I liked that it has a kitchen with dishes. Made it easier not to keep a cooler full of ice. On my first visit it was with my family. They loved it. It is hard to please a 12 and 14 year old but I didn't hear any complaints. I could watch them from my room while they went swimming. Tiffany and Shawn did everything possible to make our stay wonderful. If you need something they were right on it and with smiles. They made the visit a little more special with their hospitality.I felt like a welcome guest. Thanks Tiffany and Shawn!!! My second trip was last weekend and my sister and friend went with me. My sister stayed on the lower level(which was awesome). She was able to walk out her sliding doors to the pool. Made it easy to walk back and forth for things while out at the pool. The motel has a ice and soda machine on the lower level. Very nice. Location was great too. The beach was never to crowded. This is a motel you just have to stay at. I know I will come back anytime I visit Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: Crystal B
Reviews.Content: This was the best hotel we stayed at our entire time in Florida. It was great to have a fridge and stove to fix our own meals. Also the staff was the friendliest staff we delt with. They let us check in early and even called our room soon after to make sure everything was ok. Also the atmosphere of the motel was like a family everyone was very nice and welcoming. We will definatley stay here again the next time we visit Daytona! Least I forget, the view was to die for!!!

Reviews.Title: “outstanding property”
Reviews.Author: jim_kelly424
Reviews.Content: planned a trip to daytona area for 3 days ! spent many hours on line reviewing motels that had vacancies for 7/8/12 thru 7/11/12 !!! i am a senior citizen who is very particular !!! i picked beachside motel based on reviews and i was glad i did !!!! the staff lead by manager tiffany was outstanding !! next time i go to the area i know where i will stay !

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Place & Nice People...”
Reviews.Author: jonrsw
Reviews.Content: Great place to hang for a couple of days... Have stayed here twice and love it for very simple accommodations on the Southern end of Daytona Beach away from the noise and craziness. Close to restaurants. Nothing fancy, but good enough to have have a beachfront room with a balcony and a place to make meals if you need it. The place is cheap and cheerful and a great value. They say they will be improving the rooms in late 2012. Pool and beach right in front.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: Dao H
Reviews.Content: Although it may not look like much, this was a great place to spend our vacation. The staff was extraordinary friendly, and helpful in every way. The view was beautiful, and the rooms were very well kept. We will definitely be coming back as soon as possible!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it and will be back!”
Reviews.Author: Nicci C
Reviews.Content: For the last three years our family has went to three different places in Florida. We stayed in Treasure Island one year and then Orlando the next. Neither of the places we stayed were places that we just had to return to. However, this year we stayed at the Beachside Motel in Daytona and can't wait to go back next year. When I called and spoke with Tiffany and explained our situation of having a child with Autism, she was quick to make any accomodations that our son would need. That itself was more than a huge help not only to our son but to us as a family. We loved the staff, the location and the hotel. Getting ready to book our trip now for next year!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah M
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel with super friendly and honest staff. I have stayed several times and each time it was GREAT. My last stay my wife lost her wedding ring and I called and the staff went so far as to search the vacuum cleaner and found the ring inside of it. I would highly recommenced this place. Great Prices as well. Best in Daytona.....

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service and great views”
Reviews.Author: Shawnhota4521
Reviews.Content: Had a great time, rooms clean, service was great, walking to the beach was like stepping off back porch, I give it an A+++++. Manager was really nice and gave good options for places to eat and visit. I will definetly go back again. Already book for next year.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, priced well and great staff !”
Reviews.Author: Amy H
Reviews.Content: This is a small motel with a great beach front location. It is very clean and well priced. The front desk staff was extrememly friendly, helpful and hard working. I wasn't sure what to expect for the price, but I would definitely go back and refer it to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: DebieDC
Reviews.Content: We arrived at about 2 pm and Tiffany was at the desk. Check in was pleasant and fast. We went to see our room. It was nice but on the first floor right in front of the pool, no view and lots of noise from people at the pool, we have no kids and really came to relax. Tiffany was great about changing our room to one on an upper floor though the hotel was totally booked for the next day (we were there four nights) with some effort. We really appreciate that and i am sure that was a big contributor to the relaxing time we had. The place is not plush but that's not what we were looking for or paying for, for that matter. The room was plenty large, had a kitchenette, a balcony, a safe, tv with cable, it was fine. Bed was relatively comfortable, air conditioner was loud but kept the place nice and cool. The ocean view was beautiful, the pool and grassy area very nice, the beach EXCELLENT! We would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Peacefull Weekend”
Reviews.Author: DDT1973
Reviews.Content: If your looking for luxury and lots of bars and restaurants you need to go to the Hilton. The Beachside Motel is a very, clean. The staff are very courteous and willing to help if you need anything. I especially like having coffee in the lobby all day. We stayed in a suite with my daughter and her family. We had a great quiet and relaxing weekend. The pool was clean and the access to the beach was good. My oldest grandson spent the weekend body surfing. The suite was clean and stocked with everything we needed. The one thing is the suite does not face the ocean but we could overlook the bridge and intracoastal waterway in the evening. I would definitely go back to this Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Love love love this place...........”
Reviews.Author: Wendy B
Reviews.Content: We stayed here June 9th-16th and had the best time ever. The price was extremely affordable and our room was clean and fresh smelling and the ocean view was immaculate. The staff was so friendly and helpful and the manager Tiffany went above and beyond to make our stay extra special. We will be back next yr and the yr after that and so on....I highly recommend this place!!!! Thank you Tiffany, Sean and the remaining staff for such a fanastic vacation. See you soon!

Reviews.Title: “Dream Vacation”
Reviews.Author: carl c
Reviews.Content: Great time in Florida. Excellent motel, service was great, rooms were clean, accomodating to all our needs. Pool was clean and the beach was right there in front of us. The managers were very friendly, and we will stay here when we come back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation spot for couples and families!”
Reviews.Author: Melissamora
Reviews.Content: Our family had the best vacation ever! It was a first for myself, my fiancé and our 6 children!The staff was wonderful. Our children "had"to have photo's with Tiffany and Christine before we headed home. They made us feel like family and not just guest. Perfect spot on the beach is a plus!! Will be going back next year with my family and my fiancè's family for our wedding!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best home from home”
Reviews.Author: Missestourist
Reviews.Content: I stayed from Sunday thru Friday and loved every moment. First the staff was extremely freindly and had nice uniforms. Second the smell of fresh complimentary coffee in the lobby was delicious and tasted great. I love the variety of flavors. Thrid the hallways and my room smelled so fresh. My room was clean and cozy. Third the housekeepers did a fantastic job keeping my room tidy. And last you can't bet such an unbelievable price for such an amazing room. I love the ocean wow. I loved this motel I will be excited to return.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Karen M
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel for the money. Innkeeper, Tiffany, was extra helpful, friendly and efficient. This small hotel is right on the beach. You can sit at the pool and almost be on the beach and in the water. The older kids could be on the beach and we could sit at the pool and have full view of them on the beach and in the water. Hotel is under work for improvements but did not cause any problems with our stay. Do your self a favor stay here!! And tell Tiffany we said hello!!

Reviews.Title: “Affordable way to enjoy Daytona”
Reviews.Author: MoonWorshipper
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Beachside Motel over Memorial Day weekend. It was a nice, medium-sized place right on the ocean side of the street. We stayed in a room with a king bed on the 3rd floor and had a great view up and down the beach. They have a really nice pool and deck area in the back and there is a shower so you can get the sand off from the beach. The room was large and all rooms have a kitchenette and balcony. Having a kitchen is nice because you can save money by bringing food with you or getting takeout from area restaurants. The staff was very friendly and the place looked very clean. This is one of the few places to stay on Daytona beach that didn't cost close to $200 (we paid $89 with AAA discount). It is an older, solidly built building so you don't hear much noise from other rooms or the street. They do have an ice machine and coin-op laundry machines. The place isn't fancy, but it is a good value. The only things I din't like so much was that the blankets feel like sand paper - if you are picky, you may want to bring your own. It would be really nice if there were some paper towels in the kitchenette. They give you dishes, dish towel, washcloth and soap, but no paper towels. And lastly... note to cleaning staff - PLEASE CUT BACK ON THE PINE-SOL (or use something else)! That is all I could smell when I walked into the room and it was very strong. We ended up keeping the sliding door open and the bathroom fan running for almost 3 hours while we were down at the pool just to clear out the smell.

Reviews.Title: “"Relaxing Stay"”
Reviews.Author: polarbare48
Reviews.Content: This is the "Little Motel That Could"...A very nice vacation spot. Front desk staff was always courteous and helpful, and did not fail to make you feel like an important guest. The Kitchenette was a plus, with a full stove and large fridge....Just .8 miles of walking the beach and you are at the Pier (enjoy a cold brew). If you look out in the morning you just might see a couple of Dolphins, and a beautiful sunrise. This might not be a 5 Star Motel, but you get 5 star service, and good value.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Birthday.”
Reviews.Author: Ian W
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Beachside Motel for my Birthday weekend. The rooms were every clean and I loved that there was a full kitchen, My Friends and I were able to make wings in the oven and keep cold soda in the fridge and even have an Ice Cream cake in the freezer. It was a great night hanging out by and in the pool with friends and an amazing sunrise the next morning. The entire staff was very nice and extremely helpful. Beth, the super attractive front desk person was always there for any questions we had. All and all it was a Great weekend and it was a Great place to stay. I will definitely be going back to the Beachside Motel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great family fun”
Reviews.Author: Karl B
Reviews.Content: Our family goes to the Dayton Beach a couple times a year and love staying at Beachside. The Sunday pool side afternoon music is really great. They have a nice mix of music and it is really enjoyable. The staff is really friendly and helpful. Rooms are spacious, kitchenette are a huge plus. It is at a great location on the beach, it is on the quieter end of the beach. The mangers Tiffany & Shawn really go out of there way to make sure that you have a very enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “get away from life”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: We stayed for the weekend and it was great! Waking up to the sounds of the ocean and close to everything. The staff could not have been any better, always cheerful nice and accommodating. We will stay there any chance we get to.

Reviews.Title: “The BEST place to go for a group getaway!”
Reviews.Author: Kat_M773
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to write a review and say that we have been going to the Beachside Motel for several years now for our annual friends and family beach weekend, and there is a reason we keep coming back. The rooms are clean, the staff is super-friendly, and the view from the balcony is worth waking up at sunrise for each morning. They take care of everything our group needs, from extra cots or towels in the rooms, suggestions on local activities to keep our teens happy, to even having a DJ poolside for the best entertainment while relaxing. Whether we need 2 rooms or 15 rooms, they can handle it all, and at a price no one else can touch. It is truly a family friendly environment. We will definitely be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “very affordable”
Reviews.Author: jj5627
Reviews.Content: I was pleased that the lady at the front desk was able to accodomate me on short notice. the pool was clean and the rooms. The only thing I may suggest that the hallways had a smell could use air freshner or the rugs need to be cleaned. but most important this was a quiet and a safe motel

Reviews.Title: “A place to go back to”
Reviews.Author: FL-JuneBug
Reviews.Content: We visit the Daytona Beach area somewhat frequently, as we live in Central Florida and it's a quick getaway. We once had a "favorite" place, but it changed management and is no longer a place we enjoy staying. Beachside Motel is wonderful. The front desk personnel were all very friendly and accommodating. Check-in and check-out went smoothly. Complimentary coffee in the lobby was a nice touch. The room was clean and cool, the drapes were open, so we walked right into a beautiful ocean view. Our room overlooked the pool, also, which I don't usually like, but we were there at a quiet time and the pool area was not loud & rowdy. The pool was clean and clear. About 15 minutes after we settled into our room, we received a call to make sure we were happy with our room. Everything is fresh and clean, the appliances are modern and CLEAN, the bathroom was spotless. the sliding glass doors were clean, and the air conditioning worked great. The price was right, a great value for an ocean front kitchenette. If you want a flat screen HDTV in your room, or if you're looking for a resort & spa, this is not your stop.

Reviews.Title: “Last minute 'beachside' getaway.”
Reviews.Author: LifeApp
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for one night last month. The staff was very friendly!!! The view was nice... overlooked the pool and ocean. It was a convenient choice, honestly not our first pick, but we were thankful for a room with an ocean view nonetheless. Our hopes if we stayed here again would be a cleaner bathroom and to not be right outside of the lobby / front door area. Overall, it was a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “Top Notch!”
Reviews.Author: Arnold V
Reviews.Content: This was the first time I had been to Daytona and thanks to Beachside Motel, it was a great experience! My friend and I came for a couple of days on the weekend and didn't like being on the first floor so we asked if we could switch and were told they were all booked. When someone didn't show up for their reservation, we were immediately called and offered the available room which suited us much better! Never did I expect that kind of service from Beachside and am truly grateful! Your staff really made the difference. Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: “anniversary get away”
Reviews.Author: Bonnie0822
Reviews.Content: great little place! very clean, friendly english speaking staff. brought paper plates and plastic ware, and didn't need it, everything was provided. we would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay (March 2012)”
Reviews.Author: Doug N
Reviews.Content: Wonderful! Housekeeping staff excellent. Well maintained. Was being repainted (exterior) upon leaving. Rates were very good.Will consider this location again. Coffee in lobby was an added bonus! Prompt maintainance when requested - no major problems. Signed - Guests from Altamont, IL. Doug and Marilyn N.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, inexpensive and great view.”
Reviews.Author: April R
Reviews.Content: Our first time staying in Daytona Beach. This is a small (5 stories) motel. We had a room with a king bed oceanfront. What a view. We had a kitchenette which was very convenient. It was a very clean motel. The pool overlooks the beach. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “The ladies at the front desk as well as the cleaning staff were all extremely polite and helpful.”
Reviews.Author: TARA1967
Reviews.Content: Julia,Tiffany,Brittany,Beth and the one with her nametag upside down...(I hope I got everybody's name correct) They were all very cheerful, respectful, helpful and cool. My friend and I were pleasantly surprised at our accomodations...clean room and great view. We would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: shanda v
Reviews.Content: We were here with the Cheer convention, This was a very nice motel and the staff was awesome. Will be back !

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Spring Break location!”
Reviews.Author: Kim G
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I really enjoyed our stay at the Beachside Motel. All employees of the motel are very friendly and helpful! We were greeted each time we passed through the lobby and by the housekeeping staff as well. The room was very clean and the property was well-maintained! The exterior was being painted during our stay and there was never any interuption or noise from the paint crew. The new color looks great! Love the location of this motel, the pool and the beach was perfect. We are already planning our next trip to Daytona and would make Beachside Motel our home at the beach for the week!

Reviews.Title: “Always a pleasure!”
Reviews.Author: SHASHASunnyFlorida
Reviews.Content: Our gang has enjoyed every stay with Beachside! Its like going to our home at the beach. The upgrades are looking so good and everyone there is always helpful and polite. We stay in the 2 room suite..and with the hugeness of the space it is such a great deal..its 2 rooms for the price of 1. I had the best night sleep..beds are so comfy! Its in a great location, just minutes from Walmart and lots of restaurants. Can't wait to get back there!!!! The Behrendts and Moores (April 11-12)

Reviews.Title: “Best Place Ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: SpencerB21
Reviews.Content: This place is fantastic!! Christine and the manager Tiffany are just wonderful!!! The place was nice and clean and the balcony had a great view of the pool and beach!! Not far from entertainment and just the best overall experience!! Thanks ladies for making this a fantastic stay at a wonderful place!!!

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service that cannot be beaten”
Reviews.Author: Jim S
Reviews.Content: When I arrived at the Beachside Motel at Daytona Beach Shores I was greeted by Tiffany Barkdoll who I later learned that with her husband was one of the owners of the Motel. After registering we learned we had a problem. This reservation was booked through Expedia and no place on the website or in conversation with Expedia was the situation surrounding pets ever mentioned. After checking in we discovered that pets are not allowed at the Beachside Mote. Tiffany could not have been of greater help. She approved the cancellation of the charges already charged to my credit card with Expedia, but then got on the phone and found a very fine place for us to enjoy our stay on Daytona Beach that did allow pets. She even discussed the price with the new motel manager and got us a better price. This kind of customer service is not the norm and was greatly appreciated. If we are ever in that area again, and I am sure we will be, we will be checking with Beachside to see if maybe they have relaxed their pet restriction or maybe we will not have a pet along. At any rate we would certainly go back to Beachside.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Heather A
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel four times now. It is the most friendly environment. it is very, very clean and reasonably priced. The staff is the BEST ever!!!!! I would recommend this hotel to EVERYONE!!!! Enjoy. all rooms are OCEAN FRONT!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Motel”
Reviews.Author: Lynn D
Reviews.Content: My sister and I stayed there during Daytona International Speed Week and found it to be very clean. The manager, Tiffany, was wonderful, along with her very friendly staff. The pool area was clean and right on the beach! Nice little furnished kitchen. I highly recommend this motel and will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location & price!”
Reviews.Author: cindi H
Reviews.Content: This is an older building with updated bathroom area. The location is oceanfront & perfect with walking path to the beach. Although the building is older, it was clean & very comfortable. I plan to stay there again!! Staff were very pleasant!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome value with direct beach access”
Reviews.Author: Cellydaniel
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel for 4 nights and had a blast. The staff was always very warm and helpful. We stayed on the first floor with an ocean view. The place doesn't look new but it is clean. There is a musty smell when we get into our room but we don't mind. The room has a small kitchen with a decent size fridge which is great. Dishes and cooking utensils were provided as well. We were able to cook a few meals and save quite a bit of money. It is far from boardwalk so it is nice and quiet. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back.

Reviews.Title: “not much from the outside, but loved it”
Reviews.Author: travelmom45750
Reviews.Content: Pulled up and saw this short pink hotel, between two towering shiny hotels. Was a little worried, but the people were great, really friendly and helpful. The suite was a great set up for our family of six, would have liked a complimentary breakfast just to keep from having to go out in the morning and would have liked to be closer to stuff for the kids, but love the experience and would stay there again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great view, Great price”
Reviews.Author: zoo260
Reviews.Content: Our oceanfront room provided an excellent view and great value in comparison with surrounding venues. The hotel has a pool as well. The kitchenette is very handy, we dined out, plenty of good restaurants near by as well as a good diner, the cracked egg for breakfast. There is a Publix up the road if you want to stock the room. The room had adequate furnishings, nothing luxurious but you are there to enjoy the beach and the out doors. We will be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the price, amazing staff!”
Reviews.Author: Fairtraveller865
Reviews.Content: Thank you Tiffany and all your staff for this experience. From reading the reviews I understand that you have turned this place around. Thumbs up!!! Again, appreciate the service!

Reviews.Title: “Wish we stayed here all week!!”
Reviews.Author: crewof2
Reviews.Content: We were wanting to stay in Florida one more night instead of heading home to Ohio. We stayed down the street at another hotel and we were ready to leave there, but not the beach. We stayed at Palm Plaza years ago and LOVED it! I was devestated that it was not open when I made our reservations. Long story short we went down the beach and decided to stay one more night if we could get a good rate. The ladies at the desk loved our story and was pleased to help us! It was by far the best day there and the best night!! We didn't want to leave for sure now!! We will definately be back!! So welcoming, great view!!!! and wonderful location..if you don't want all the hustle by the pier!!! Couldn't have ended our vacation on a happier note!!

Reviews.Title: “Beachside Motel - Back better than ever!”
Reviews.Author: CarolFreeman
Reviews.Content: Beachside has been our vacation home for 20 previous years and we just stayed for a short spring break - it's back better than ever, and the new management is awesome! They've done a tremendous job with the property - the cleanliness is superb! Fresh paint in the hallways, new tile in the halls (1st and 2nd floors) and new sliding glass doors are all positives! We've already made plans for vacation in July - and know it will be one of the best! If you're looking for a great place in Daytona at a reasonable price, make sure Beachside is your first choice!

Reviews.Title: “Extremely dirty!”
Reviews.Author: Dolores059
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel for 2 nights in February/2011 during Daytona 500. We had made the reservation in Aug/2010 for oceanfront, King bed and continental breakfast. We paid $189.00 a night for 2 people. We received ocean front and 2 double beds and coffee and donuts the first morning and only coffee the second morning. The safe fell off the wall and damaged my husband's thumb. The room was extremely dirty. The halls were dirty, the carpets were dirty, and the bedding was poor quality. At $29.00 it would be a fair deal. I would not recommend this motel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “So pleasantly surprised!!”
Reviews.Author: healthymoms
Reviews.Content: Upon first glance, one might be tempted to turn away, but "you can't judge a book by its cover!" Stayed here for one night and will definitely come back again. The room was huge and had everything you could want for a vacation at the beach. We especially appreciated the full kitchen including refridgerator, stove (with oven) and microwave. They even provided the diswashing soap! The room was spotless as well as the bathroom. If you are looking for a great place to stay away from the crowds of Daytona, this is the place. The oceanfront balcony was worth its weight as well. The pool was sparkling. Again, we will definitely be back and the next time we'll stay a lot more than one night. I see a week's vacation here in our future.

Reviews.Title: “clean and economical”
Reviews.Author: grapefarmer
Reviews.Content: I researched a while before booking here. I wanted a place on the beach w/ a beachfront room that wasn't too expensive since this was a spur of the moment trip. Husband and I spent 3 nights here and were very pleased for the price, especially after reading some of the reviews. We stayed in 305 which was a 2 double bed oceanfront efficiency. The room was definitely dated; balcony chairs could stand to be replaced, but for $75/night it was worth it. They also charge you $5/night parking, and $1.50/night if you use the safe, but they explain that the safe charges can be removed when you check out if you don't use it. For the price, a continental breakfast is included. The hotel is partners with the property next to it (palm plaza?) so you go next door to check in and eat breakfast. Breakfast included cereals, muffins, bagels or toast, hardboiled eggs, donuts, and juices/milk/coffee. An economical way to start the day! Because the two motels are partners, you have use of either pool. The pool with the Beachside goes to 8' deep, the other only 6 I believe. The Beachside pool was never crowded which was nice also, and every morning I saw them at 6 am or so cleaning the outside pool areas. The only negative about the room was it had somewhat of a funky smell, but it wasn't too noticeable after you were there-only initially. Also, the hotel used your room key to open outside doors, but the doors usually were not shut tight anyway. Overall, I'd recommend this place; people were very helpful; they even printed out our boarding passes on the last day. They also offer a "linger longer" plan where you pay more to check out late-we checked out at 3pm so that we could enjoy the beach/pool for longer, and I think it cost $20? more that day to do so.

Reviews.Title: “This Place Should Be Shut Down!!!”
Reviews.Author: jadorechanel
Reviews.Content: Upon approaching this place I thought it was a joke! The outside is a horrible pink color and looks like it was built over 50 years ago. The location is terrible...several blocks from all the "action" on Atlantic Ave. As soon as we got off the elevator a terrible STINK filled the hallway...it felt like the air conditioning had not been running for months. We got into the room and it was even worse. The smell was awful, it was oceanfront yes...but geeze. The gaudy green carpet was damp and the bathrooms were not up to par as far as cleanliness goes. We booked this hotel through hotwire-which guaranteed a 2.5 star rating (according to hotwire other 2.5 star hotels include holiday inn express' etc...), we were only going to be there for one night so we didn't care. Well, our story changed! We went to the front desk to ask about a refund - nope! So we drove down the ways and stayed at the Hilton. I cannot believe this place is still even running. As a family of four (two children under two years old) I would never recommend another family or couple stay there. If you are in your teens and want to get away for a night or two with some friends and get drunk and don't care at all about stench or cleanliness...then this is the place for you! I would never stay here again - and am seriously considering making it my life's mission to let people know how absolutely horrible this hotel truly was!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Quaint Resort - A Do Again!”
Reviews.Author: mkl404
Reviews.Content: We were pleasantly surprised at how comfortable and outstanding this hotel was, not to mention the view and accessability to beach. We will recommend this to everyone! If you are the kind of visitor who MUST have the plushy over the top decorated, brand new facilities, then stay somewhere else. This one is clean, comfortable and has freindly staff, and ANY type of free continental breakfast is adequate for me......if you don't like free meals, there are numerous palces to spend money for breakfast nearby. We will definatley do this one again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice little place”
Reviews.Author: hoosier4
Reviews.Content: The Beachside Motel (next door and part of Beachside Plaza) is a nice little place to stay. Our room had a kitchenette including refridgerator, microwave, and toaster, also had ironing board and room safe. Room was nice, but a little dated. Bathroom was nice and clean. Plenty of storage space, including closet. Pool and outside area was always nice and clean. Staff was always friendly, room was serviced every day around the same time.Only minor negatives were they didn't have our reservation at check in(don't know if it was Hotel problem or Orbitz problem), ice machine out of order(ice available next door at Plaza), and wireless internet access was only available next door at Plaza lobby or pool area(not that big a deal). If we go back to Daytona Beach again, we will probably stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Will not stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: GeorgiaGagirl
Reviews.Content: The hallways were dark and musty smelling. They left a can of awful smelling trash right by the elevator on our floor. All of the pillows on our beds were hard as bricks. There was black hair that floated out of the drain in the shower. The continental breakfast was a joke! It was supposed to go from 7-10 am but by 8:30 every morning, all of the food was gone... and they would not make any effort to put more out. All they had were cold, frozen biscuits and little cups of cereal. The juices were really watered down. My parents were in the room next to us and they called the front desk 3 times about their foul-smelling refrigerator. Nobody ever came. Also, they charge their guests $5.00/day to park. We do not plan to stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: GUJJJ
Reviews.Content: Called on Memorial Day for a room that same night. Hotel was very accommodating. Clean room with an ocean front balcony. Large refrigerator with a freezer (for ice) was appreciated. Standard bathroom. Very relaxing to sit out on the balcony during the day or night watching the people or staring at the water. Complimentary continental breakfast until 9:30am. Easy parking and within walking distance of convenience and package stores. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “What Staff??”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I had reserved a room for Daytona 500. When We arrived we told there was listing for Us. Staff had no clue what they were doing!! Luckly we found another place. There are tons to choice from instead of a hotel who will take your money but not your time!! To my surprised was still charged for a nights stay ???

Reviews.Title: “relaxing and casual”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Relaxing and casual is the atmosphere at the Beachside. My husbands family reunion is at Beachside every year in July. We have kitchenette's in the room and the bathrooms are quite nice to. We see the same staff every year. They are all very friendly. My husband and I love it there and can't wait till next July...Thanks Beachside for a great Vacation every year.

HotelInfo.Name: Beachside Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 3309 S. Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118
